name: Progremzion Change Out of stock text to Sold
author: Progremzion

sections.description: This plugin will replace text Out of stock to Sold
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Progremzion Change Out of stock text to Sold.
  2. Upload the ‘pz-woo-text-change’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Progremzion Change Out of stock text to Sold from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

From your WordPress dashboard

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Progremzion Change Out of stock text to Sold.
  2. Upload the ‘pz-woo-text-change’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Progremzion Change Out of stock text to Sold from your Plugins page.

upgrade_notice: Automatic updates should work great for you. As always, though, we recommend backing up your site prior to making any updates just to be sure nothing goes wrong.
